claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

verified_evidence.quote: Study 7 (NCT02290509) enrolled subjects 18 through 49 years of age randomized to receive Flublok Quadrivalent or a Comparator inactivated influenza vaccine (Fluarix® Quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline). The safety analysis population included 998 recipients of Flublok Quadrivalent and 332 Comparator vaccine recipients.
verified_evidence.explanation: A very similar quote appears on page 3: 'Study 7 (NCT02290509) enrolled subjects 18 through 49 years of age randomized to receive Flublok Quadrivalent or a Comparator inactivated influenza vaccine (Fluarix® Quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline). The safety analysis population included 998 recipients of Flublok Quadrivalent and 332 Comparator vaccine recipients.' The wording and content match the quote to verify, with only minor formatting and spacing differences.. The quote directly states that Study 7 enrolled subjects 18-49 years old who were randomized to receive either Flublok Quadrivalent or Fluarix Quadrivalent (a standard-dose quadrivalent influenza vaccine). This directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

The safety analysis population included 998 recipients of Flublok Quadrivalent and 332 Comparator vaccine recipients.' The wording and content match the quote to verify, with only minor formatting and spacing differences.
verified_evidence.support_explanation: The quote directly states that Study 7 enrolled subjects 18-49 years old who were randomized to receive either Flublok Quadrivalent or Fluarix Quadrivalent (a standard-dose quadrivalent influenza vaccine). This directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
verified_evidence.original_relevance: This quote directly states that Flublok Quadrivalent was evaluated in a trial (Study 7) against Fluarix Quadrivalent, a standard-dose quadrivalent influenza vaccine, supporting the claim.

verified_evidence.quote: Study 6 (NCT02285998) enrolled subjects 50 years of age and older, randomized to receive Flublok Quadrivalent or Comparator (Fluarix Quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline) as an active control [see Clinical Studies (14)].
verified_evidence.explanation: A very similar version of the quote appears on page 3: 'Study 6 (NCT02285998) enrolled subjects 50 years of age and older, randomized to receive Flublok Quadrivalent or Comparator (Fluarix Quadrivalent, manufactured by Glaxo smith kline) as an active control [see Clinical Studies (14 1.' The wording is nearly identical to the quote to verify, with only minor differences in spacing, capitalization, and punctuation.. The quote directly states that Study 6 (the pivotal trial) enrolled subjects 50 years and older and randomized them to receive either Flublok Quadrivalent or Fluarix Quadrivalent (the standard-dose comparator). This directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
verified_evidence.presence_explanation: A very similar version of the quote appears on page 3: 'Study 6 (NCT02285998) enrolled subjects 50 years of age and older, randomized to receive Flublok Quadrivalent or Comparator (Fluarix Quadrivalent, manufactured by Glaxo smith kline) as an active control [see Clinical Studies (14 1.' The wording is nearly identical to the quote to verify, with only minor differences in spacing, capitalization, and punctuation.
verified_evidence.support_explanation: The quote directly states that Study 6 (the pivotal trial) enrolled subjects 50 years and older and randomized them to receive either Flublok Quadrivalent or Fluarix Quadrivalent (the standard-dose comparator). This directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
verified_evidence.original_relevance: This quote confirms that in Study 6, Flublok Quadrivalent was compared directly to Fluarix Quadrivalent, providing evidence that the pivotal trial used Fluarix as the comparator.

verified_evidence.quote: Abbreviations: rtPCR=reversetranscriptasepolymerasechainreaction; Comparator=U.S.- licensed quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine, Fluarix quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline; n=number of influenza cases; N=number of subjects in treatment group; RR=relative risk (Attack Rate Flublok/Attack Rate IIV4); rVE = [(1-RR) × 100]. *Study 6 is registered as NCT02285998.
verified_evidence.explanation: A very similar version of the quote appears on page 4 of the document: 'Abbreviations: rtPCR=reversetranscriptasepolymerasechainreaction; Comparator=U.S.- licensed quad rival ent in activated influenza vaccine, Fluarix quad rival ent, manufactured by Glaxo smith kline; n=number of influenza cases; N=number of subjects in treatment group; RR=relative risk (Attack Rate Flublok/Attack Rate IIV4); rVE = [(1-RR) × 100]. *Study 6 is registered as NCT02285998.' The wording and abbreviations are nearly identical, with only minor spacing and capitalization differences.. The quote explicitly states that the comparator in Study 6 was 'U.S.-licensed quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine, Fluarix quadrivalent, manufactured by GlaxoSmithKline.' This directly supports the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
